editionStmt.edition: Edition created from new transcripts of this manuscript.

respStmt.resp: Initial upload of this work's facsimile images and metadata to FromThePage.com for editing
Adminstrator of the Stagville Accounts transcription project on FromThePage.com
made 125 edits between February 25, 2016 and March 28, 2018 .
made 6 edits between January 12, 2017 and April 2, 2018 .
made 5 edits between March 22, 2016 and March 22, 2016 .
Did some manual changes for the bk-ontology, 30.07.2018.

sourceDesc.p: Accounts of Stagville Plantation Store from August 1808. Wheaton Financial Papers

table.head: 69 William Pettigrew Jr. Self Dr. James Haley J Self Dr.

cell.measure: 1/4 lb Iron work'd at the Shop in July

table.head: 69 Henry Moize PP Bro Jonathan Dr.

row.cell: 4 yds Ribbon 4/- 1 hk Silk 1/- 1 bunch wire 1/- PP B. Henry

div.p: 69 Majr Micajah Bullock PP Kt Dalby Dr.
69 Mark Veazey PP Bro William Dr.
69 James Cash PP Brother Bryant Dr.
ARG lost my transcription will do the beginning again later :(
31| Merch.s for Sundries sold this month [??] Sales| 16|18||
div.note: As with the regular day book pages, subtotals are included in the main column, with totals in the rightmost column
Can't remember if I should use ditto marks or reenter the information (e.g. the next patron to pay in full or the next patron on the same day)

div.p:
Merchandise Vizt
pd Wm Henry [Haxall?] PP Bill & Receipt $70.34
pd Robert Nelson & Co PP Bill & Receipt $29.00
pd John W. Campbell PP Bill & Receipt $57.08
$156.42|78|4|3|

Tobacco accot Vizt
pd for 6336 [?] 19/6 PP wh $205.93
pd for 1331 [?] 20/- PP wh $44.37
pd for Turning up 4 Hhd 3/ $2.00
$252.30|126|3||

Rich Bennehan [Hon?] Vizt
pd for 1 pr Boots $12 & 1 pr Shoes $3 for TDB|7|10||

|General Charges pp Vizt
|pd B. M. Myers for [Boutting?]
|Cloths PP Bill & Receipt $66.00
|pd Bream & Follett for Mill Screw PP Bill & Receipt $30.00
|pd Maben & MOrrison for Leather PP Bill & Receipt $19.50
|pd John G Davis for 15 [?] Rum PP Bill & Receipt $25.00
|pd John V. Wilcox for screw plate $4.00
|pd for Beef & Oysters $12.11
|pd for 1 Glazed Hat $4.00 1 pr Shoes $1 3/4 for [Jerry?] $5.75
2|pd for Fish & Oysters $1.50
3|pd for Waggon Expences PP John
|Wilkins's Satement $2.50
23| pd for Expences of 2 Waggons PP John
|Wilkins's Statement $6.25
172.61|86|6||

3| Anthony Cozart pd his Son Robert
for Tobacco in full|7|5||
3| John Wilkins pd him at twice|2|11|6|
10| Shadrach Roberts pd him at twice|18|10||
17| John Scarlett pd him in full| 1|10||
27| Charles Roberts pd him in full|10|5|6|
